final_description: Arm's Reach Original Co-sleeper 100% Cotton White Sheet is specifically designed to fit Arm's Reach Co-sleepers, providing a soft and comfortable sleeping surface for your baby. Made from 100% high-quality cotton, this fitted sheet offers durability, breathability, and a clean, neutral look that complements any nursery décor.

Blind Cord Wind Ups help keep your window cords neatly organized and safely out of reach, reducing the risk of accidents in your home. Made from durable plastic, these easy-to-use devices clip securely around blind cords and retract excess line with a simple twist, blending seamlessly with any décor.

Northstate Superyard Playgate Light Gray is a durable, stylish play gate designed to provide a safe and spacious enclosed area of 18.5 square feet for children, indoors or outdoors. Featuring six easy-to-set-up panels and a portable carrying strap, this light gray play gate offers both security and convenience, with the option to expand the area with an extension kit.

Playtex Drop-Ins Original BPA Free Nurser Newborn Starter Set is a BPA-free feeding kit designed for newborns and new parents. The set includes five bottles (two 4-ounce and three 8-ounce) that use a disposable-liner system with both standard plastic-bag style and Playtex Drop-Ins liners, four different types of nipples (infant, round, older baby, and orthodontic), and features like the 'Eazy-Feed' system for easier burping, making it a convenient choice for various feeding preferences.

Terry Contoured Changing Pad Cover - Ecru is crafted from high-quality, soft Terry cloth to provide a comfortable and secure surface for your baby. Designed to fit snugly around contoured changing pads, this elasticized cover is easy to clean, holds up well through many washes, and adds a stylish, functional touch to your nursery.

Prince Lionheart Stroller Connectors securely join two identical strollers side-by-side, keeping them approximately 6 inches apart. This set includes three pre-assembled, 7.5-inch molded plastic connectors, each featuring rubber grip pads and lock tabs for easy attachment and reliable stability.

Medela Breastmilk Storage and Feeding Set is a comprehensive kit designed to help breastfeeding mothers collect, store, and feed breast milk with ease. The set includes four 150 ml (5 oz) BPA/DEHP-free containers, slow-flow silicone nipples, multiple lids for short- and long-term storage, and convenient accessories—all compatible with any Medela breast pump and dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. With easy-to-read volume markers and secure storage options, this set offers a reliable solution for managing your breast milk supply.

Medela CSF Bags - Economy 50 Pack are durable, economy-priced bags designed for collecting and storing fluids. Each pack includes 50 sturdy bags with a secure closure mechanism, making them ideal for reliable fluid collection and storage.

Terry Contoured Changing Pad Cover - Blue is made from soft, thick-pile 100% cotton terry cloth, providing a comfortable and absorbent surface for your baby. Designed to fit most standard contoured changing pads, this cover features an elastic hem for a snug fit, is machine washable and bleachable for easy care, and does not include slits for changing-table safety belts.
PRIMO EuroBath, Pearl White, features a sleek design in a classic pearl white color. Crafted from premium materials, it offers durability and adds a touch of elegance to your bathroom.

Philips AVENT BPA Free Classic Newborn Flow Nipple, 2-Pack features a soft, flexible silicone nipple designed to provide comfort and support during feeding. Engineered to mimic the natural feel of breast milk, these BPA-free nipples are ideal for newborns, especially those transitioning from breastfeeding to bottle feeding.

Philips AVENT Soft Spout Magic Cup, 9 Ounce, Twin, Color May Vary features a patented nonspill Magic Valve that allows for easy sipping with less suction and prevents spills when not in use. Designed for children 6 months and older, this durable, translucent polypropylene cup comes in a convenient twin pack with assorted fun colors and fits most car and stroller cup holders, making it ideal for travel and everyday use.

The First Years Essentials Care Kit provides parents with a convenient collection of high-quality baby healthcare items, all stored in a handy zippered travel case. The kit includes a Flex-tip digital thermometer, travel medicine dropper, hospital-style aspirator, baby nail clippers, four emery boards, a Shake and See rattle for baby stimulation, and comes with complete instructions and parenting tips.

Sassy Soft Grip Comb & Brush features soft, comfortable handles and a gentle, curved comb designed to fit the contour of your baby's head. The soft bristles on the brush are kind to delicate scalps, making this set ideal for gentle daily grooming of babies.

Playtex 3 Pack BPA Free VentAire Wide Bottles, 9 Ounce (Colors may vary) are designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit-ups with a patented anti-leak bottom vent and micro-channel vents for consistent liquid flow. These BPA- and phthalate-free bottles feature an angled design for semi-upright feeding, easy-to-grip shape, pre-calibrated markers for accurate measuring, and open at both ends for easy cleaning. Dishwasher safe and recommended by pediatricians, they offer a safe and convenient feeding solution for your baby.

Prince Lionheart Formula Mixer is a dual-purpose, battery-operated tool designed for easy mixing of formula or powdered drinks directly inside a bottle, and for frothing milk in coffee drinks with its two interchangeable attachments. Its ergonomic design makes it simple to use and clean, offering convenient preparation for busy, on-the-go lifestyles.

Safety 1st Finger Pinch Guard is a soft, flexible safety device that easily attaches to most doors to prevent them from closing, helping keep your child's hands safe from accidental pinches. Ideal for parents seeking to enhance home safety, it offers peace of mind without compromising comfort or convenience.

Badger Basket Barrel Top Toy Box, Natural features a sturdy wooden frame with a smooth, non-toxic finish and a classic barrel top design, making it both functional and decorative for playrooms or nurseries. Measuring 31" L x 17.5" D x 19.5" H, this spacious toy box includes a safety support hinge that keeps the lid open in any position and prevents it from slamming shut, providing a safe and reliable storage solution for toys, baby blankets, and bedding. Easy to assemble with included illustrated instructions, it is built to last for years of organized play.

The First Years Hands Free Gate Extension is designed to extend the reach of The First Years baby gates, making it easy to secure wider doorways or spaces for your child's safety. This five-inch extender seamlessly integrates with your existing gate, providing added coverage without compromising stability or functionality. Once installed, the extender remains immobile, allowing the gate to open and close smoothly between extenders or between an extender and the wall.

Eddie Bauer Backpack - Navy features a stylish, durable design with a sleek navy blue exterior, contrasting black straps, and genuine pigskin leather trim. Designed for everyday use, this backpack includes a drawstring opening with an easy-close flap, a front pocket, multiple bottle holders, slash and mesh outside pockets, a side zipper for easy access, padded adjustable back straps, and built-in bottom rubber guards. Made from high-quality Cordura nylon, it measures 14-3/4"H x 13-1/4"W x 6-1/2"D.

Lamaze: Pupsqueak the Puppy is a soft, interactive toy shaped like a puppy, designed to engage babies through sound and movement. Petting its nose triggers a barking sound, while additional features like squeaks, crinkles, and rattles encourage exploration and discovery. An added link makes it easy to attach and take along for on-the-go play.

Ecru Folding Hamper offers a compact, space-saving solution for organizing laundry in any room of your home. Featuring a sturdy frame, durable fabric liner, and a neutral ecru color that complements most décor, this free-standing hamper unfolds easily for use and includes a removable mesh bag insert for convenient transport to the laundry room. Its versatile design allows it to be placed next to a changing table, slid into a closet, or set up wherever you need extra storage.

Kushies Washable Pre-folded Diapers, White, are made from premium quality 100% cotton flannel for a soft, breathable, and comfortable fit for your baby. Featuring a convenient pre-folded 2-4-2 design for extra absorbency in the center panel, these reusable diapers can be worn pinned or folded with a Kushies diaper wrap, offering an eco-friendly and sustainable choice for caregivers.

Kiddopotamus Tinydiner Placemat, Yellow, is a durable, award-winning placemat designed for children, featuring a vibrant yellow color and a whimsical animal design to add a playful touch to mealtime. Made from 100% waterproof, phthalate-compliant, lead-compliant, BPA-free, latex-free, and PVC-free material, it provides a clean, safe eating surface with a built-in scoop to catch messes and suction cups to keep it securely in place. The placemat easily rolls up for convenient portability, making it perfect for use at home or on the go.

Toysmith Battat Ready Set Go Cars Toy is a colorful set of four spunky, chunky vehicles designed for children. Each car features pullback action for movement, realistic details, and unique sounds—like chimes, squeals, rattles, and bells—to encourage imaginative play and help kids learn about different vehicles.

Tiny Love Symphony-in-Motion Remote Mobile is a colorful crib mobile designed to engage and stimulate babies with its animated animal characters, gentle spinning motion, and pleasant classical music by Mozart, Beethoven, or Bach. Parents can use the included remote to start a 15-minute music cycle or select a specific composer without disturbing their child, while the mobile's design keeps the toys angled within baby's view and safely out of reach. As your child grows, the music box can be used separately for independent play.

Koala Baby Chambray Hamper - Light Blue is a sturdy hamper designed for baby nurseries, featuring a light blue canvas bag with a soft, comfortable interior and a practical top flap with decorative buttons. Supported by a wooden frame, it includes a removable, machine-washable mesh bag for easy transport of dirty clothes, making it a stylish and functional addition to your nursery or changing area. Dimensions: 17"L x 16"W x 27"H.

Inclined to Sleep is a memory foam sleeper designed specifically for infants up to 6 months old, providing firm yet gentle support from head to toe at a 60-degree angle. Its calming blue and white design, inspired by nature, and machine-washable cover with adjustable Velcro attachments ensure a comfortable and secure fit for your baby, helping them rest safely and comfortably.

Mother's Touch Deluxe Baby Bather provides a safe, comfortable, and supportive bathing experience for newborns and infants. Made with soft, absorbent mesh fabric and an adjustable backrest, it cradles your baby securely while non-skid feet and a solid base ensure stability. The machine washable, mildew-resistant fabric is easy to remove, and the bather folds compactly for convenient travel and storage.

Safety 1st Hospital's Choice 8 Second Digital Thermometer provides quick and accurate temperature readings in approximately 8 seconds. This digital thermometer is compact, user-friendly, and suitable for oral, rectal, or underarm use, making it ideal for both healthcare professionals and parents caring for infants and young children.

Snap 'N Go Infant Car Seat Carrier is designed to let you easily transport your infant by popping a car seat into the sturdy frame, turning it into a convenient stroller without disturbing your baby. It features adjustable straps for easy installation and removal, dual cup holders, a large storage basket for diaper bags or other items, and a collapsible design for travel.

Parent Units DVD Guard is a transparent plastic shield that slips over most DVD players to cover buttons and the disc drawer, helping keep your equipment in working order. It can be easily removed and replaced as needed, and remote controls still function when the guard is attached, making it a convenient solution for homes with children.

Dr. Brown's Natural Flow Level 3 Standard Nipple, 3 Pack includes three replacement silicone nipples designed exclusively for Dr. Brown's Natural Flow Standard baby bottles. The Level 3 flow is ideal for feeding infants aged 6 months and above, providing a comfortable and secure fit for easy bottle feeding.

Wonderworld Twist 'N' Roll is a colorful, twistable toy designed to engage children and help develop their hand-eye coordination. Featuring playful designs and a beaded squeeze mechanism, it is flexible, easy for babies to grip, and made from non-toxic water-based painted wood and plastic beads. This fun toy encourages imaginative play as babies explore, develop, and learn.

The Ultimate Baby Wrap in Navy is a soft, breathable cotton-Lycra carrier designed by real moms to support bonding and comfort for both baby and caregiver. With a hidden 3-point security harness, it offers five carrying positions—including hip, back, torso, upright, and nursing—and supports babies up to 35 lbs. An instructional video is included to help you get started.

Prince Lionheart Complete Dishwasher Basket System is a versatile dishwasher accessory designed to optimize cleaning performance. Featuring multiple compartments, it efficiently cleans, sanitizes, and rinses nipples, collars, pacifiers, teething toys, spill-proof cup parts, and more—making it a practical choice for households with infants and toddlers.

Fisher Price - Aquarium Take-along Swing is a portable baby swing with a colorful aquatic theme, designed to keep your little one entertained at home or on the go. As the swing moves, colorful fish in the side "aquariums" appear to swim, and your baby can tug one of the hanging sea creatures to start music and dancing lights. Featuring eight swing speeds, six musical selections, deep cradle support, volume control, non-slip feet, and a machine-washable seat pad, this swing is suitable for babies from birth to 25 lbs and folds compactly for easy transport.

Fisher-Price Booster Seat, Blue/Green/Gray is a versatile and stylish dining solution designed for children, featuring a visually appealing color scheme and equipped with safety straps for secure seating. This healthy care deluxe model includes a feeding tray that can be sanitized in the dishwasher, supports children weighing up to 50 pounds, folds compactly, and comes with a convenient carrying strap for easy transport.

SafeFit Baby In Sight is an extra-large convex mirror designed to help parents safely monitor their rear-facing infant while driving. It features three different attachment methods, including a tether system, fits most vehicles with vinyl, leather, or cloth seats, and has a soft-as-suede fabric that coordinates with car interiors.

Citrus Circles Diaper Pail Deodorizing Disks are small, round, and colorful disks made of deodorizing material that absorb odors and neutralize unpleasant smells in your diaper pail. Easy to use, simply place them directly into the pail for continuous odor control and a fresher environment. Each pack includes 3 Citrus Disc Circles.

Parent Units TV Guard Button Blocker, 10"X1", is a durable and easy-to-install device designed to cover and block buttons on televisions and other electronic devices, helping prevent unauthorized or accidental use. Its compact 10-inch by 1-inch design effectively shields both remote controls and device buttons, offering long-term protection against tampering.

The First Years Two Receiver 49 MHz Monitor is a portable baby monitor designed for clear audio communication, featuring two receivers for flexible monitoring in different rooms. It includes sound lights to indicate your baby's activity level, a low battery indicator, and a compact, lightweight design for easy use and peace of mind.

Manhattan Toy Soft Activity Book with Tethered Toy, Buzzing Through is a soft, interactive book designed to engage babies and toddlers with sensory exploration and fun activities on each page. Featuring a buzzing, moving tethered toy and a rhyming story, this educational book encourages early reading and nurtures imagination.

North States Superyard Play Yard, Grey, 6 Panel provides a safe, enclosed play area for children, measuring 18.5 square feet and standing 26 inches high. Made of durable, weather-resistant plastic, this sturdy play yard can be used indoors or outdoors, is easy to set up and break down in seconds, folds flat for storage, and includes a carrying strap. The six interlocking panels are pre-connected for simple assembly, and an optional two-panel extension kit (sold separately) is available to increase the play space.

Friendly Toys Little Playzone Extension Kit, Single is designed to expand your existing Little Playzone, adding an additional 18 square feet of play area. This single extension kit is non-toxic, BPA-free, and easily attaches to create a larger, more versatile space for children.

Galt Playnest - Jungle is a soft, padded velour playmat designed to provide a safe and stimulating environment for young children. Featuring colorful, interactive elements with textures and sounds to explore, it supports cognitive development and learning through play, and is machine washable for easy care.

Child to Cherish Baby To Bride Bracelet is a cherished keepsake crafted from sterling silver and freshwater pearls, featuring a delicate heart and bow charm that symbolizes love and commitment. Presented with an acrylic frame and a poetic story, this elegant bracelet celebrates the journey from childhood to marriage and honors beloved wedding traditions.

Haba Ramba Zamba is a colorful wooden toy designed to engage young children with its vibrant yellow base, blue and red elements, and interactive shapes and patterns. Encouraging creativity and fine motor skills, this educational tool offers stimulating play for toddlers.

Supergate Extra-Wide Gate, Ivory is a durable, easy-to-install gate designed for indoor use, fitting openings from 22" to 62" wide and standing 31" high. Made of non-toxic plastic with safe round edges and heavy-duty uni body construction, it can be used for kids and pets and is easily removed or slides/swings out of the way for storage. This gate is suitable for use at the top or bottom of stairs and between rooms.

Kiddopotamus SwaddleMe Microfleece, Small, Blue is a cozy swaddle designed for infants, made from plush microfleece that is gentle on baby's skin and easy to care for. Its adjustable soft fabric wings provide a snug, customized fit, while the convenient leg pouch allows for quick diaper changes without unwrapping your baby. The soothing blue color and secure swaddling help comfort newborns and may promote better sleep.

Safety 1st Grip 'n Go Walker is a lightweight, sturdy baby walker designed to help infants who can sit unassisted, weigh less than 30 pounds, and are under 32 inches tall learn to walk safely. Featuring an adjustable, comfortable seat, non-slip base, special safety grips, and brakes on the back wheels, it also offers engaging toys, lights, and sounds for entertainment, a front tray for snacks or toys, and folds down easily for storage. The machine-washable seat and easy assembly make it convenient for parents, while meeting JPMA and ASTM safety standards for peace of mind.

Flutterbye Deluxe Soft Gym is a soft, padded play gym designed for babies, allowing them to activate lights, music, and motion by touching or moving the hanging toys. With features like twinkling lights, engaging music, and a birdie that flutters back and forth, it provides a comfortable and entertaining environment for infants.

Fitted Portable Crib Sheet in Yellow Duck Print features a vibrant and playful design that adds a cheerful touch to any nursery. Made from pure knitted cotton, this soft and durable sheet has fully elasticized bottoms and deep pockets for a snug, secure fit on standard portable crib mattresses, and is machine washable for easy cleaning.

The Boppy Pregnancy Wedge with Cotton Slipcover is a compact, wedge-shaped pillow designed to provide targeted support and comfort during pregnancy. Ideal for use while sleeping or lounging, it offers ergonomic relief for your back and neck and features a soft, removable cotton slipcover for easy cleaning.

Evenflo Soft And Wide Gate Taupe & Chocolate is a stylish, pressure-mounted safety gate designed to fit doorways and openings from 38 to 60 inches wide. Made with lightweight steel tubes and soft yet durable mesh panels, it features a padded top rail for added comfort and installs easily without tools, making it ideal for protecting children ages six to 24 months in light traffic areas.

KidCo Finger Guard - Gray - 2 Pk helps protect children's fingers from getting pinched or injured by doors. Made of soft, flexible material, these easy-to-install guards fit doors 1 3/8 inch to 1 2/4 inch thick and help prevent doors from slamming. Made in the USA.

Dr. Brown's Natural Flow Standard Reservoirs Replacement, 2 Pack, are designed to replace worn or lost reservoirs in your Dr. Brown's Natural Flow bottle system. Compatible with standard 8-ounce bottles, these reservoirs are an integral part of the patented internal venting system, helping to ensure smooth and gentle feeding for your baby.

Britax Marathon Convertible Car Seat, Granite is a versatile and durable car seat designed for infants and toddlers, featuring a five-point harness with tangle-free straps, four adjustable height positions, and the patented HUGS system for enhanced safety and comfort. It offers easy installation with both LATCH and traditional seatbelt systems, a stain-resistant removable cover, and meets Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard 213, making it suitable for use in cars and on airplanes. With a higher weight capacity and adjustable features, this car seat provides long-lasting security and comfort for your child.

Medela TheraShells Breast Shells are designed to provide relief for breastfeeding mothers experiencing sore nipples, engorgement, or flat/inverted nipples. Featuring two interchangeable backs for targeted comfort and protection, these BPA-free shells offer a discreet, low-profile fit under clothing and help soothe and protect between feedings.

Sesame Street Framed Friends Green Folding Travel Potty Seat is a child-friendly, Sesame Street themed potty seat designed for travel. Featuring a vibrant green color scheme, sturdy framed design, and built-in seat with lid, it ensures safety and comfort for young users on the go.

Protect-a-Bub Classic Sunshade - Twin - Black is a versatile and stylish accessory designed to protect babies and children from the sun while using double strollers. Made from woven UPF 50+ breathable fabric, it provides over 98% protection from harmful rays, allows full air circulation, and ensures complete visibility for infants and toddlers. Its fully adjustable design and easy installation make it compatible with all canopied double stroller models, keeping your children safe and comfortable outdoors.

Summer Infant Day and Night Handheld Color Video Monitor with 1.8" Screen - Silver offers real-time video and audio monitoring of your baby with a clear 1.8-inch color display, night vision, and sound-activated lights. The parent unit features a 350-foot range, rechargeable battery or A/C power options, brightness and volume controls, and a convenient belt clip and stand for portability. The baby unit includes a self-filtering directional microphone and can be placed on a tabletop or mounted on the wall.

Svan Svan High Chair Cushion - Sage is a plush, ergonomically shaped cushion designed to provide comfort and support for children using high chairs. Featuring a stylish sage color with a unique tree-like pattern, this high-quality cushion fits all stages of the high chair, is easy to remove and clean, and is made from a soft cotton and polyester blend to enhance your child's seating experience.

Kel Gar Tubbly Elephant Bubble Bath Dispenser is a cute, elephant-shaped cover made of durable plastic that fits over standard metal faucets to help protect children from bumps and bruises during bath time. Simply pour bubble bath into the elephant's trunk to create tons of bubbles, making baths more fun and engaging. Not compatible with faucets that have shower diverters on the spout or with Delta Faucet Models 1548 and 2600.

Mommy's Helper Kid Keeper is an adjustable safety harness designed to keep children secure and close to parents while out in public or on the move. Featuring a sturdy handle, double swivel snap design, and adjustable straps that fit chest sizes from 14" to 25.5", it can also be used to secure children to high chairs, grocery carts, or strollers. The 42" hand strap doubles as a safety strap, and the harness is machine washable for easy care.

Skip Hop Dash - Canvas-Chocolate is a stylish and practical canvas bag designed for everyday use, featuring a chic chocolate color scheme. With ten roomy pockets, a zippered compartment to protect personal items, and unique stroller straps for easy attachment, it’s an ideal accessory for fashionable parents seeking both form and function.

The Chicco C5 Umbrella Stroller is a lightweight, stylish stroller designed for comfort and convenience, weighing just 13.7 pounds. It features a multi-position reclining seat with adjustable leg rest, thick padding, a five-point safety harness, all-wheel suspension, and a convertible sun canopy with included rain cover, making it suitable for various weather conditions. With its one-hand fold mechanism and automatic storage latch, this stroller ensures easy use and a smooth ride for both parent and child.

Munchkin: Fresh Food Feeder Colors vary is designed for infants and toddlers to safely introduce solid foods like fruits and vegetables. Featuring a soft, flexible mesh bag that snaps shut to secure food and an easy-grasp handle, it helps reduce the risk of choking while making mealtime enjoyable and convenient at home or on the go.

Infantino Peek, Rattle and Teether is a colorful baby toy designed to engage and stimulate your little one's senses. Featuring four soft shape boxes with different activities, four unique teething rings, varied textures, and gentle rattling sounds, it encourages sensory exploration and helps soothe teething discomfort. A built-in mirror also promotes visual discovery and early cognitive development.

Combi BPA Free Teether, 6 Months features a soft silicone texture that gently soothes your baby's gums while providing stimulation to the lips, tongue, and tiny front teeth. Designed for babies aged 6 months and older, this teether helps promote the transition from nursing to chewing, offers a variety of shapes and firmness levels, makes noise when shaken, and is easy for little hands to hold with its center hole. It is dishwasher safe and comes with a sterile case for convenient storage.

JL Childress MaxiCOOL 4 Bottle Cooler, Black, is a sleek and compact cooler designed to hold up to 4 standard bottles, 3 wide-body bottles, or 3 sipper cups, keeping them cold and fresh while on the go. Made from durable, fully insulated materials with a leak-proof, PVC-, lead-, and phthalate-free lining, it features four separate bottle compartments, a secure closure, a front storage pocket, a reusable ice pack, and a snap handle that attaches easily to strollers.

Playtex 2 Pack VentAire Silicone Slow Flow Nipple features soft, BPA- and phthalate-free silicone nipples designed for gentle infant feeding and easy cleaning. The vented design helps reduce gas, colic, and spit-ups by keeping air out of the liquid, while the NaturalShape nipple supports a smooth transition from breast to bottle. Compatible with the VentAire bottle system, these narrow-shaped nipples are gentle on baby's gums and lips.

Sugarbooger Classic Lunch Sack, Dia De Los Muertos features a colorful, festive pattern with friendly decorated skulls, perfect for carrying lunch or snacks to school or daycare. Made from laminated cotton canvas with full insulation, it includes a hook-and-loop closure, convenient handle strap, and an interior card for ID information. This non-toxic, lead-free lunch sack is easy to wipe clean and conforms to U.S., Canadian, and European safety standards.

North States Supergate Classic Plastic Gate Mounts 5 Different Ways offers versatile security for your home, with five mounting options to fit doorways, stairways, and railings 26-42 inches wide. Made of durable plastic and certified by the Juvenile Products Manufacturers Association, this gate is ideal for households with children (ages 6-24 months) and pets, and includes both pressure and hardware mount options, smooth rounded edges, and a one-year manufacturer's warranty.

Fisher-Price Deluxe Jumperoo is a colorful, freestanding activity center designed to help babies develop motor skills and coordination through interactive toys, lights, and sounds. It features a soft, padded seat, adjustable height, a removable toy tray that reveals a snack tray, and a sturdy steel frame with safety features. The built-in music player and detachable toy bar keep little ones engaged and entertained as they play.

Sassy Snap and Squirt Sea Creatures are colorful, sea creature-themed toys designed to engage children in playful learning and creative exploration of ocean life. Each creature features a snap mechanism and can squirt water, and they come in a vinyl fishbowl container that suctions to the tub for convenient storage and play.

Sassy Baby Mealtime On the Go Feeding Set, Colors May Vary, is a convenient nine-piece feeding set designed for babies and toddlers 6 months and older. It includes one large sectioned feeding dish with lid, three removable individual dishes with lids for snacks or smaller portions, and a toddler feeding spoon that stores easily in the large lid—perfect for use at home, daycare, or on the go. Colors may vary to suit different preferences.

Protect-a-Bub Deluxe 3-in-1 Sunshade - Single - Black provides UPF 50+ protection, blocking over 98% of the sun’s rays to keep your child safe and comfortable in their stroller. Featuring a large mesh window for 70% shade and visibility, an adjustable flap to control sunlight, and a honeycomb weave for airflow, it also helps shield against mosquitoes, insects, and flying debris. This versatile sunshade fits most single strollers and can be used in three positions: Full Sun Protection, Tent Style, and Visor.

American Baby Company Jersey Knit Porta-Crib Sheet, Maize is made from 100% high-quality cotton in a soft, cozy jersey knit. Designed to fit all standard 24W x 38L portable crib mattresses, this durable sheet provides a snug, comfortable surface for your baby and is easy to care for with machine washing.

Kidco Safeway white G2000 is a hardware-mounted baby gate designed to provide safety and security in your home. Made of durable plastic with a sturdy frame, it is permanently mounted to a baluster or wall for reliable protection and peace of mind.

Colgate Classica I Foam Crib Mattress, White features high-quality, hypoallergenic foam construction designed to provide a comfortable and safe sleeping environment for infants. This mattress offers excellent support and breathability to help reduce the risk of overheating, and its easy-to-clean surface makes it a practical choice for parents.

Fisher-Price Sensory Selections Bouncer is a baby bouncer designed to stimulate your baby's senses and provide comfort. It features a soft, cushioned seat, an overhead arm with sliding beads and distinct black and white patterns for sight stimulation, and includes interactive sensory elements to aid in your baby's development.

Snoozy Organic Cotton Waterproof PlayYard Pad Featuring Safety Stay on Corners, 27"x 37", is crafted with a 100% organically-grown cotton surface and a soft knit allergy barrier, backed by an ultra-thin, breathable waterproof membrane. Designed for safety and comfort, it features patented safety stay-on corners, extra-deep sides for a secure fit on various play yard mattresses, and is machine washable for easy care.

Munchkin Deluxe Potty Seat is designed for children and provides a comfortable, soft, and cushioned surface to help make potty training easier. Featuring easy-grip handles and a smooth surface for simple cleaning, this potty seat comes in a variety of colors to match different bathroom styles.

BABYBJORN Baby Sitter 1-2-3 Activity Bouncer, Black Gingham, is a stylish and minimalist baby bouncer designed for infants from 8 pounds up to 24 months or 29 pounds. Featuring a soft, cushioned, reversible seat, three adjustable positions, and a natural bouncing motion—no batteries required—it provides comfort, support, and a safe spot for your baby to observe family life, all in an elegant design that fits seamlessly into modern homes.

Kiddopotamus CozyUp Carrier Cover, Navy & Ivory, is a stylish and reversible cover designed to keep your baby warm and comfortable in car seats and strollers. Featuring a water- and wind-resistant nylon outer shell, a soft fleece lining, and an elasticized edge for a secure fit, it offers easy access with a full zipper, a fleece-lined collar for extra protection, and a handy pocket for essentials—all without interfering with harness straps or limiting airflow.

The Evenflo SimpleStep Pressure Gate Taupe is a sturdy, lightweight metal safety gate designed to help keep children ages 6 to 24 months safe by blocking access to doorways or the bottom of stairways. Featuring a pressure-mount system for easy, tool-free installation, it expands from 29 to 39.5 inches with the included extension panel, stands 30 inches tall, and offers convenient one-handed operation with a Slide-Loc mechanism and a red/green lock indicator. The gate swings open for easy passage, latches shut with a simple push, and has closely spaced slats for added safety; it is not recommended for use at the top of stairways.

Haba Croo-ak Clutching Toy features a frog-themed design with beech wood parts threaded onto an elastic band and colored with non-toxic, water-based stain. Moving the pieces produces a soft rattling sound, encouraging looking, clasping, and listening skills in babies. Made in Germany, it also complements the HABA Croaking Frog Clutching Toy.

Taggies Plush Toss the Taggies is an 8-inch, super soft and cuddly plush toy designed for interactive play with children of all ages, including newborns. Featuring bright colors, playful tags, and a gentle rattle sound, it encourages tossing, rolling, and sensory exploration while supporting early motor skills and social-emotional development.

Prince Lionheart Compact Seatsaver is a durable car seat protector designed to shield your vehicle’s seats from spills, stains, dirt, and scuff marks. Compact and versatile, it installs easily without tools, conforms to any size automobile seat, and helps keep car interiors clean while protecting leather and upholstery from damage.

Leachco Prop 'R Shopper - Shopping Cart Cover - Sage Pin Dot provides a stylish and protective barrier between your baby and shopping cart surfaces, shielding them from dirt and germs. Featuring a thickly padded design with two soft pillow props for support, toy tabs, an adjustable safety belt, and a convenient storage pouch, this cover ensures comfort and security while you shop.

Stork Craft Aspen 3 Drawer Chest, Cherry features a sleek, modern design with three spacious drawers, offering ample storage for clothes, linens, and other household items. Crafted from high-quality wood with a durable, non-toxic finish, this chest includes steel drawer glides with safety stops, round wooden pulls, and a tipping restraint for added safety, meeting or exceeding juvenile furniture safety standards. Fisher-Price Bath Tub Corner Cubby provides convenient storage for bath toys and essentials, fitting neatly in the corner of your bathtub. Belkin WeMo Wi-Fi Baby Monitor for Apple iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch (Firmware Update) lets parents monitor their baby remotely through a Wi-Fi connection and a dedicated smartphone app. With real-time alerts and live video feeds, this device ensures a seamless monitoring experience and is updated for compatibility with Apple devices.

NUK Large Learner Cup, 10 Ounce, is designed to help infants and toddlers transition from bottles, featuring a soft silicone spout that is gentle on gums and a spill-proof design. The cup includes removable, anti-slip easy-grip handles for comfortable holding, and an air vent in the spout. Its large capacity makes it ideal for multiple feedings throughout the day.

Safety 1st Complete Air 70 Convertible Car Seat, Seabreeze, is designed to grow with your child from infancy through toddlerhood, accommodating children from 5 to 70 pounds and 19" to 52" in height. Featuring both rear-facing and forward-facing modes, it offers advanced Air Protect Side Impact Protection, a five-point harness with up-front adjustment, adjustable head support, and a removable cup holder for added convenience and safety.

Tommee Tippee Single Electric Breast Pump features a sleek, compact design and a single electric motor for smooth, efficient milk expression. It includes a comfortable silicone nipple shield and a flexible hose for easy attachment and removal, making it convenient for both pumping and storage.

Levana Keera 32012 Remote Controlled Pan/Tilt/Zoom Camera with 3.5-Inch Screen (White/Black) offers remote-controlled pan, tilt, and zoom functions, allowing you to easily monitor your environment. The 3.5-inch screen provides clear visibility and convenient control from a distance.

Manhattan Toy Go Push Toy, Puppy is a vibrant, puppy-shaped push toy designed to encourage play and exploration in young children. Featuring bright colors, a playful design, and durable materials, it is easy to grasp and helps support gross motor skill development for crawlers and walkers.

Munchkin White Hot Inflatable Safety Tub and Bath Ducky Set includes a comfortable, spacious inflatable tub with a textured surface and contoured headrest to help keep your child secure and make hair washing easy. Both the tub and the included water-tight bath ducky feature built-in White Hot technology that indicates when the water is too hot for your baby, ensuring a safe and enjoyable bath time experience. The tub also drains, deflates, and folds quickly for convenient storage, while the ducky is perfectly sized for little hands.

Dr. Brown's Teether, Ridgees Giraffe is a soft, textured teether designed by a pediatric dentist to soothe and entertain babies during the teething process. Shaped like a giraffe and made from high-quality materials, it safely reaches all areas of the mouth—including back molars—to massage gums and provide pressure relief for erupting teeth. Suitable for babies aged 3 months and up.

Mommy's Helper Outlet Plugs 144 Pack provides a simple and effective way to cover and protect standard electrical outlets, helping to keep children safe from potential hazards. With an extra-tight fit to ensure the caps stay securely in place, this large pack is easy to install and ideal for parents and caregivers looking to safeguard their home.

Fisher-Price Stack 'n Store Sippy Cup Straw Top, Neutral, 2-Count features stackable, nestable cups with removable handles for easy storage and organization. Designed for infants and toddlers, these BPA-free, leak-free cups have straw tops for easy drinking, are dishwasher safe, and hold up to 8oz each.

KidCo Peapod Plus - Kiwi is a portable sleep tent designed for infants and toddlers, featuring anchoring straps, adjustable sun screens, and an inner mesh zipper panel for easy access. It includes a removable Micro-Lite sleeping pad for comfort and UV protection, comes fully assembled, and is lightweight for convenient outdoor use.

NUK Gerber Graduates Fun Grips Hard Spout Sippy Cups, Boy, 10 Ounce, 4-Count are designed for toddlers learning to drink independently, featuring a fun grip design and a bite-resistant hard spout. Each 10-ounce cup includes Seal Zone technology for leak-proof, spill-proof, and break-proof performance, an hourglass shape to help prevent tipping, and a personalization area for your child's name.

The phil&teds Poppy Highchair, Bubblegum, is a stylish and modern highchair designed for babies, featuring a vibrant bubblegum-colored seat and backrest. Lightweight and compact, it boasts a spongy soft, dishwasher-safe Aerocore seat and a seamless construction that’s easy to wipe clean, making it a practical and comfortable addition to any home. Plus, it conveniently converts to a toddler chair for eating and play as your child grows.

OXO Tot Cup for Big Kids, Aqua is designed to help children transition from sippy cups to drinking like grown-ups. With its easy-to-hold shape and comfortable grip, this durable cup is perfect for big kid hands and allows kids to see how much liquid is left, helping to minimize spills.

Taggies Strap Covers, Pink are ultra-soft covers designed to protect your baby from chafing caused by car seat safety straps. Featuring extra padding, smooth satin tags for soothing entertainment, and a convenient Velcro closure, these covers make car rides more comfortable for your little one.

Safety 1st Outlet Cover with Cord Shortener, 6 Pack provides comprehensive protection for your home or office by covering electrical outlets and preventing accidental plugging. Each cover includes a built-in cord shortener to keep cords organized and out of reach, helping to ensure a safer environment for children and pets. The 6-pack offers convenient coverage for multiple outlets throughout your space.

Fisher-Price Tote 'n Glow Soother, Elephant is a soft, elephant-shaped soother designed to comfort and relax babies with its gentle glowing feature. Its appealing design helps encourage infants to feel secure and at ease while they sleep, and it also assists parents in tracking their baby's sleep patterns.

25 mm One-Piece Breastshield w/ Valve and Membrane for Medela Breast Pumps; Set of 2; Made by Maymom includes two 25mm one-piece breastshields, each with a valve and membrane, designed for seamless attachment to Medela breast pumps (except Medela Harmony). This set provides a secure fit and efficient pumping experience, allowing Medela users to use the 25mm size commonly preferred by many breastfeeding moms.

Summer Infant Slumber Buddies, Elephant is a soft, plush toy designed to help infants and babies sleep, making it an ideal bedtime companion. Shaped like an elephant, it creates a tranquil environment with a calming starry sky display and a peaceful selection of soothing sounds to relax your child.

Baby Jogger City Select Single Child Tray, Black is a durable and easy-to-clean accessory designed exclusively for the Baby Jogger City Select stroller. Maxi Cosi Kaia and Mico NXT Travel System, Total Black, combines a sleek, all-black stroller and infant car seat for a stylish and functional travel solution. Designed for infants, this compact system offers comfort, safety, and easy transport, providing peace of mind for parents on the go.

The First Years Straw Cup, Take and Toss, 10 Ounce, 8-Count is a set of durable, reusable straw cups designed for children aged 8 months and older. Each 10-ounce cup features a snap-on, spill-resistant lid and a straw for easy sipping, and all items are dishwasher safe, BPA free, and compatible with other Take and Toss lids for added convenience.

Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature Perfect Prep Formula Machine is a high-quality, automatic device designed to simplify baby formula preparation for parents. Featuring a sleek, modern design, easy-to-use controls, a large capacity tank, built-in timer, and a convenient storage compartment for extra bottles, it ensures convenience and efficiency for busy families.

Wubbanub Infant Pacifiers (Pink Kitty) feature an adorable pink kitty plush made from soft, high-quality materials, designed to soothe and comfort infants. The bean-filled plush provides stimulation for little fingers and helps keep the medical-grade, latex-free Soothie pacifier—sewn securely into the toy—close to your baby without the need for cords or clips. Safe, durable, and independently tested, this pacifier is recommended for full-term newborns up to 6 months and includes complete care instructions.

Zoli Baby Bunny Teether - Orange is a soft, bunny-shaped teething toy designed to soothe your baby's gums. Featuring dual soft textured tips to reach back molars and an easy-to-hold oval handle, it is made from high-quality materials and is free from BPA, Phthalates, PVC, Nitrosamine, and Latex, making it safe for babies aged 0+ months.

Summer Infant 3D lite Convenience Stroller, Black is a lightweight and compact stroller designed for easy maneuverability and transport. It features a comfortable seat and backrest, along with a convenient storage basket at the base for carrying essentials while on the go.

Baby AIO Cloth Diapers Washable Reusable Adjustable Boy One Size Cover, 12 pcs + 12 Inserts, are eco-friendly pocket diapers designed for boys and adjustable to fit babies from 8–35 lbs. Each diaper features a suede cloth inner layer that wicks moisture away from your baby's skin, with 12 covers and 12 absorbent inserts included for everyday use. Machine washable and dryable, these reusable diapers help reduce waste and limit exposure to chemicals found in disposables.

Infantino Pat and Play Water Mat is a colorful play mat designed for infants and babies, featuring a soft, water-filled surface that encourages sensory exploration and motor skill development. Six floating pals move when your baby pats the mat, making it perfect for tummy time and engaging play.

Foscam FBM3501 Digital Video Baby Monitor - 2.4 Ghz with Pan/Tilt, Nightvision and Two-Way Audio/Video Camera with 3.5-Inch LCD (White/Gray) features a 2.4 GHz connection, pan/tilt functionality, night vision, and two-way audio/video capabilities. Its 3.5-inch LCD display and white/gray design provide clear monitoring and easy communication for parents.

Mud Pie Pacifier Clip, Moose features a layered felt moose icon and a green and white polka dot grosgrain ribbon for a cute, functional look. Designed to hold your child's pacifier securely with a Velcro closure, this stylish accessory helps prevent lost or tangled pacifiers while on the go.

The Summer Infant SwaddleMe WrapSack Blanket, Sunny Bee, Small, is a lightweight and breathable swaddle designed to keep your baby snug and comfortable. Made from soft, breathable fabric, it features a cute bee design and adjustable straps for a secure fit that’s easy to use as your baby grows.

American Baby Company Organic Cotton Quilted Pack n Play Size Fitted Mattress Pad Cover, Natural, features a soft organic cotton interlock top layer, a breathable polyester middle layer, and a waterproof polyester backing to provide a comfortable and protective sleeping surface for infants. Designed to fit pack n play mattresses (27" x 39" x 4"), its quilted construction offers added warmth and gentle care for sensitive skin, and it is machine washable for easy care.

Philips AVENT Comfort Breast Pump Valves are designed as replaceable components for use with the Philips AVENT Comfort Breast Pump, ensuring smooth and efficient milk flow. Made from high-quality, BPA-free materials, these soft and flexible valves are easy to attach, durable, and should be replaced as needed to maintain optimal pump performance. Summer Infant Keep Me Clean Disposable Potty Protectors, 20 Count, offer a hygienic solution for potty training or public restroom use. These disposable, extra-large protectors are made with absorbent material and feature an adhesive backing to help secure them in place, providing coverage for most toilet seats and making cleanup easy—just toss away after use.

Skip Hop Nursery Plush Toy, Treetop Friends Owl is a soft, cuddly owl designed to soothe and entertain infants and toddlers. Featuring a friendly expression and colorful design, this high-quality plush toy offers visual and tactile stimulation while complementing your nursery decor as part of the Treetop Friends collection.

Skip Hop Giraffe Safari Puppet Activity Book Toy features a soft, interactive book with colorful safari scenes and engaging activities designed for children. Summer Infant Ultra Plush Change Pad Cover, Safari is a super soft velboa cover designed to fit most changing pads, providing extra warmth and comfort for your baby. Nuby Chewbies Silicone Teether is a soft, flexible teether made from medical-grade, BPA-free silicone, designed to soothe babies' teething pain and sore gums. Green Sprouts Stacking Cups are a colorful set of eight stackable cups made of BPA- and PVC-free polypropylene, designed to help children develop fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. Born Free BPA-Free Twister Bottle Brush Set includes multiple uniquely shaped brushes designed to fit all wide neck bottles and nipples. Skip Hop Giraffe Safari Spin and Play, Rhino, 12 Months Plus is an interactive educational toy designed for young children. Featuring a playful rhino character, it encourages learning and fun through engaging activities, making it ideal for kids aged 12 months and up.

The Baby Einstein Musical Motion Activity Jumper is a colorful, interactive entertainer designed for babies at least 4 months old. Fisher-Price 4-in-1 Sling N Seat Tub is a versatile baby bathtub designed to grow with your child, featuring both a supportive sling for infants and a built-in seat for toddlers. The Summer Infant Dual Coverage Digital Color Video Monitor Set provides clear, high-quality video footage from two angles or locations, allowing parents to easily track their baby's activities. With its digital color display, this versatile monitor set enhances visibility and offers peace of mind for families monitoring their children.

ReSqueeze Reusable Food Pouch (4-pack) offers a convenient and eco-friendly way to store and transport snacks, meals, or soft foods for infants, toddlers, and school-age children. Featuring a leak-proof design, extra wide bottom opening for easy filling, and heavy duty dual-zip seal, these pouches are perfect for applesauce, yogurt, smoothies, or baby puree, and come in four vibrant colors for practical, everyday use.

Imagine "Smart Fit" Prefold Diapers 6-pack - Unbleached - Large are made from natural, unbleached cotton for a gentle touch on your baby's skin. OXO Tot 2 Count Handy Stroller Hook, Silver/Green, features durable, lightweight aluminum construction and a soft silicone grip to keep shopping bags securely in place. Britax Marathon G4 Convertible Car Seat, Cowmooflage, is designed for infants and toddlers and can be used both rear-facing and forward-facing. It features a five-point harness system, built-in ISOFIX anchor points, and a unique cowmooflage pattern for a modern look.

The Baby Jogger City Mini GT Single Stroller, Black, features a sleek, compact, and lightweight design that makes it easy to maneuver and ideal for urban environments. Boba 4G Baby Carrier (Kangaroo) is a stylish, ergonomic baby carrier featuring a soft, padded interior and a unique Kangaroo print designed by Eva Chang. Baby Jogger City Lite Stroller, Black, is a lightweight and compact stroller designed for convenience and easy maneuverability. Orbit Baby G3 Stroller Cargo Basket, Black, is a spacious and sturdy accessory designed specifically for the Orbit Baby G3 stroller. Mommy's Helper Car Seat Sun Shade, 2 Count (2 PACK), provides effective shade and protection for your child's car seat, helping to keep it up to 26 degrees Fahrenheit cooler. Sassy Splashin' Fun Bath Tub, Turtle is a playful and colorful bath toy designed for children. Featuring a vibrant turtle theme, it is made from durable materials to ensure safety and long-lasting fun during bath time.

Philips AVENT Breast Milk Storage Bags, 6 Ounce, 25 Count provide safe and hygienic storage for your breast milk, with each pre-sterilized bag holding up to 6 ounces. Featuring a dual layer design, reinforced seams, tamper-evident seal, and a wide neck for easy filling and pouring, these self-standing bags can be stored in the fridge or freezer and let you easily see the amount of milk inside.

BRICA Deluxe Stay-in-Place Mirror for In Car Safety is a durable, adjustable car accessory designed to enhance driver visibility and awareness. Featuring two mounting options—a double push-lock suction cup for rear-facing children and a visor clip for forward-facing children—this mirror provides a clear, wide-angle view and is 55% larger than the original version, making it easier to keep an eye on your child while driving.

BABYSOFT iBib is the ultimate silicone baby bib solution, designed to fit growing babies from 3 months old to preschoolers with smart, adjustable buttons for a comfortable fit. Made from 100% premium food-grade silicone, it features a deep, wide crumb-catching pocket that stays open, is easy to clean, odorless, stain-resistant, and rolls up for total portability—making it perfect for self-feeding toddlers and busy families on the go.

HALO 100% Cotton Muslin Sleepsack Swaddle, Gator Plaid, Newborn, is a soft and breathable swaddle designed to help newborns sleep safer and more comfortably. Kick Mats - Extra Large Auto Seat Back Protector in Black, 2-pack, are designed to safeguard your car seats from dirt, stains, and spills caused by kicks, roughhousing, eating, drinking, and pet fur. Featuring a double-layered, water-resistant construction with two adjustable straps for easy installation and removal, these mats offer maximum coverage, fit most vehicles, and can be wiped clean with a damp cloth. Enjoy effective, affordable protection with a 90-day risk-free money-back guarantee.

The Summer Infant EasyStore Comfort Tub, Neutral is a spacious baby bathtub designed for easy storage and travel, folding compactly when not in use. Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature First Sips Trainer Cup, 5 Ounce, is designed to help infants transition smoothly from bottle to cup. Munchkin Latch BPA-Free Bottle, 8 Ounce, 4 Count offers a safe and convenient feeding solution for infants and toddlers. Each bottle features a secure latch design to help prevent spills and is made from BPA-free materials to ensure your child's health and safety.

The Gro Company Gro-Anywhere Blind is an adjustable window blind designed to fit a variety of spaces, offering privacy and effective light control. Fisher-Price 2-in-1 Sensory Stages Bouncer is a baby bouncer designed to support your child’s development from birth, featuring a soft, cushioned seat and sturdy frame for stability. As your child grows, the toy bar can be flipped to reveal colorful animal friends and upbeat tunes, encouraging reaching, grasping, and eye-tracking with interactive elements like a pull-down flower and light-show.

4Moms mamaRoo Plush Infant Seat - Silver is designed to comfort and support your baby with a soft, plush seat and a secure, adjustable harness system. The seat also includes a breathable, waterproof fabric cover, built-in cushion, and a convenient carry strap for easy use at home or on the go.

The First Years Massaging Action Teether is a soft, yellow, star-shaped teething toy designed to soothe babies’ gums with gentle massaging action. Safety 1st Digital Pacifier Thermometer is a convenient and reliable tool designed to monitor your baby's temperature. Featuring a digital display for easy reading and a compact design that fits comfortably in your hand, it provides a fast, accurate reading in 90 seconds.

Animal Planet's Big Tub of Dinosaurs is a fun and educational toy set featuring a variety of dinosaur and prehistoric creature figures, along with simulated landscape elements like palm trees, ponds, and rocks. The First Years Nature Sensations Lullaby Player is a soothing musical toy designed to help infants and toddlers fall asleep with gentle lullabies and calming nature sounds, including rainfall, waves, a lullaby medley, and a muffled heartbeat. Mommy's Helper Drain 'N Dry Bottle Drying Rack is a lightweight white plastic rack designed to help you air-dry baby bottles, nipples, pacifiers, and trainer cups. The angled base directs excess water toward the sink for easy drainage, making it a practical addition to any nursery or kitchen.

BABYBJORN Little Potty - Red is a compact, ergonomic potty training seat designed for young children, making it ideal for use in smaller bathrooms or on the go. DEX Products Pregnancy Pillow PP-01 is a compact, wedge-shaped foam pillow designed to provide targeted support and comfort for expectant mothers during the third trimester. Prince Lionheart Crib Rail Protector provides a soft, safe surface that fits easily over crib rails to protect your baby's teeth and soothe tender gums, while also preventing ingestion of harmful varnish. Philips Avent Express Microwave Sterilizer offers a quick and convenient way to keep baby bottles and accessories clean, sterilizing up to six bottles in as little as two minutes depending on your microwave’s wattage. The sterilizer is dishwasher safe, includes a locking lid with audible clips, and comes with detailed instructions and a chart for microwave settings to ensure safe and effective use.

Evenflo 3 Pack Classic Glass Bottle, 4-Ounce features three durable, BPA-free tempered glass bottles designed for safe and easy infant feeding. The Baby Bjorn Baby Carrier - Navy is a comfortable and convenient carrier designed for infants, featuring soft, breathable, machine-washable 100% cotton fabric and adjustable, padded straps for a secure fit. This carrier promotes closeness and eye contact while freeing up your hands, though it may become less comfortable when carrying babies over 20 pounds.

Baby B'Air Toddler Flight Vest - Red is a soft cotton vest designed to keep young children comfortable and secure during air travel. Playtex 3 Pack VentAire Standard Bottles, 9 Ounce (Colors may vary) feature a patented anti-leak bottom vent and micro-channel vents to help reduce gas, colic, and spit-ups, while supporting a semi-upright feeding position recommended by pediatricians. Each BPA- and Phthalate-free bottle is designed for easy cleaning with openings at both ends, includes pre-calibrated markers for measuring liquid, and is dishwasher safe (top rack). The slender bottles are part of the pediatrician-recommended Playtex VentAire family, with a venting system and nipples designed to minimize pressure on baby's ear canals.

Kiddopotamus Snuzzler Complete Head and Body Support, Ivory Fleece & Navy Trim, provides award-winning, adjustable support for your baby's head and back in car seats, strollers, jogging strollers, and swings. Philips AVENT BPA Free Standard Breast Pump Conversion Kit is designed to convert standard breast pumps for compatibility with Avent bottles or cups, allowing you to express milk directly into them. Gerber First Essentials 2 Pack Soft Center Latex Pacifier, Colors May Vary, features two latex pacifiers with a soft center designed to provide a gentle and secure sensation for infants and toddlers. Press N Pull Plug Protectors are designed to securely cover and protect electrical plugs from dust, moisture, and potential damage. BABYBJORN Plate and Spoon - Blue is a baby feeding set designed for infants learning to eat independently. The First Years Take & Toss Spill-Proof Cups - 7 oz - 6 Pk are durable, spill-proof cups designed for children learning to drink independently. Two Avent Magic Cup Trainer Handles (colors may vary) are designed to help children transition from bottle to cup, featuring easy-to-grip, contoured handles that fit Avent Magic Cups and Avent's reusable bottle. Eddie Bauer Car Seat Travel Bag is a durable, sturdy bag designed to protect your car seat during travel. Peace of Mind Two 900 MHz Baby Receivers, Monitor offers reliable monitoring and security for your child. With two receivers operating on a 900 MHz frequency, this baby monitor provides clear and effective communication, making it ideal for parents seeking peace of mind.

Sassy Baby Powdered Formula Dispenser is a convenient solution for parents to store and dispense powdered baby formula. Fisher-Price Royal Potty is a comfortable and supportive potty training seat designed to help children learn to use the toilet independently. Featuring a soft cushioned seat, sturdy base, and a built-in reward system that plays different tunes, this "throne" is perfect for both boys and girls.

Munchkin Teething Blanket with Pacifier Attachment is a soft, comforting blanket designed for teething babies, featuring soothing teething textures on all four corners. Boppy - Tummy Play is a specially designed propping pillow created exclusively for tummy time, providing comfort and support to help develop your baby's upper body muscles.
